examples.example: 我们要学会正确使用各种工具，让它们更好地为我们服务。

translate.english: We should learn to use various tools correctly and let them serve us better.

examples.example: 我们应该合理使用资源，以实现可持续发展。

translate.english: We should use resources rationally in order to achieve sustainable development.

examples.example: 我们要合理使用时间，去做更多有意义的事情。

translate.english: We should make rational use of time to do more meaningful things.
